N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 187.4 - Inspections

State Regulations

Upon receipt of an application, the Division of Industrial

Safety Service of the Department of Labor shall inspect the shop where the
training is conducted for the purpose of determining compliance with
subdivision (b) of section
187.6
of this Part. In addition, the State Education Department will conduct an investigation and evaluation of
the work training program for the purpose of determining whether the
instruction provided meets the standards prescribed in subdivision (a) of
section
187.6
of this Part. Reports of
such inspection and investigation will be submitted to the
commissioner. Notes
